name: Events

methods.name: createEvent

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: The name of an event type: one of "UIEvent", "KeyboardEvent", or "MouseEvent".

methods.description: Creates an instance of the specified Event subclass.
methods.longdesc:
The Event returned is a UIEvent,
            KeyboardEvent or MouseEvent object,
            depending on the requested type. This object can be passed as a parameter to an element's dispatchEvent
            function in order to simulate a user-interaction event.

description: Provides access to objects used in the ScriptUI event system.
